title: Fomu
subtitle: Session 3
description:
Fomu, the FPGA in your USB Port [[File:Fomu.png|300px|right|Fomu Logo]]

Signup at tables → → →

Fomu workshop!

Current --> https://workshop.fomu.im/

Previous Version --> https://workshop-old.fomu.im/

Please sit in the Mammoth Space - (has Pink Lights)

  1. Workshop is self directed.
  2. Go to https://workshop.fomu.im or https://fomu-workshop.rtfd.io/
  3. Complete set up
  4. Get hardware from Mithro
  5. Continue workshop
  6. Raise your hand if you get stuck!


Help: irc.freenode.net #tomu -- https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/tomu-discuss/join








Hardware Pickup



[https://workshop.fomu.im Complete the setup], get a [https://fomu.im/ free Fomu board]

Sessions



All sessions are the same!

This workshop will be given multiple times (all sessions are identical). [https://workshop.fomu.im The workshop] is self guided with helpers for when you get stuck. Please sign up on the paper at the [[Assembly:Hardware Hacking Area|Hardware Hacking Area!]]

Come get an FPGA dev board in your USB port and start hacking! Getting the toolchain set up and working will earn you a free Fomu from [[User:Mithro|Tim 'mithro' Ansell]] (while stocks last).

''(This is one of many cool things happening throughout 36C3 in the huge '''[[Assembly:Hardware Hacking Area|Hardware Hacking Area!]]''')''
